show_name: Cautious Hero: The Hero Is Overpowered but Overly Cautious (TV)
other_title: Kono Yūsha ga Ore TUEEE Kuse ni Shinchō Sugiru (Japanese)
Shinchō Yūsha - Kono Yūsha ga Ore TUEEE Kuse ni Shinchō Sugiru (Japanese)
慎重勇者 ～この勇者が俺TUEEEくせに慎重すぎる～ (Japanese)
plot: The goddess Lista summons a hero who excels in every area to assist her. He's everything she expected him to be except for one, tiny thing: this anxious hero can't do anything unless he's absolutely sure nothing can go wrong. (from manga)
